abilities.name: Armor
abilities.text: If your opponent has 5 or more cards in his or her hand, any damage done to Pinsir by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Delta Call
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Pokémon that has δ on its card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
